game.name: Dice Card Heroes
game.shortDescription: In this roguelike deckbuilder, every card features its own dice. Battle against many fantastic creatures across 3 chapters. Upgrade your cards, build countless synergies and find mighty weapons to shape your playstyle. There is only one goal: Be the hero, slay the dragon.
